ThingDef.label: oak logs
ThingDef.description: Raw wood from trees or other fibrous plants. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch.

ThingDef.label: poplar logs
ThingDef.description: Raw wood from trees or other fibrous plants. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch.

ThingDef.description: Raw wood from trees or other fibrous plants. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch.

ThingDef.label: Ironwood logs
ThingDef.description: Wood from ironwood trees. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch. Very beautiful decorative material.

ThingDef.Name: WoodLog
ThingDef.label: synthwood logs
ThingDef.description: A log of synthwood. Synthwood comes from a tree which was genetically designed to produce usable wood quickly at a low cost.

ThingDef.Name: WoodEbony
ThingDef.label: ebony logs
ThingDef.description: Cut logs of ebony, a very luxurious and sturdy wood known for its dark coloration.

ThingDef.Name: WoodAmaranth
ThingDef.label: amaranth logs
ThingDef.description: Cut logs of amaranth, also known as purple heart. It possesses a striking violet color as well as almost legendary durability.

ThingDef.Name: WoodQuebracho
ThingDef.label: quebracho logs
ThingDef.description: Cut logs of quebracho. Quebracho's name is derived from Quebrar Hacha, meaning Axe Breaker in Spanish.
